name: C64 & AMIGA Classix Remakes Sixpack
description: Enjoy the touch of nostalgic retro feel and play 6 classic game Remakes of the C64 and AMIGA era.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 2.5 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard Soundcard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 2.5 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard Soundcard
